message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but that price is a bit high for my budget. Would you consider $65?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $85.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still a little ways off. How about $75?
I'm not willing to go much lower than that, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $88.
